Package fr.ferret.controller.input.common

Class InputPanelController

java.lang.Object
fr.ferret.controller.input.common.InputPanelController
Direct Known Subclasses:
LocusPanelController, NeedingConversionPanelController
public abstract class InputPanelController extends Object
The base for input panel controllers (locus, gene and variant panel controllers)

      protected void run(Consumer<? super File> action)
      Ask the user for a file and runs the given action if file selected

      action - The action to execute with the selected file

    • getSelectedPopulations

      protected SampleSelection getSelectedPopulations()
      Resets the RegionPanel borders and gets all selected populations by zone
      Returns:
      A list of the selected zones (using the zones codes of the Region class)

    • downloadVcf

      protected void downloadVcf(SampleSelection populations, File outFile, List<Locus> locusList, StatePanel download)
      Downloads the VCF for the given Locus list and saves the file for the given selection
      Parameters:
      populations - The sample selection (people) to include in the VCF file
      outFile - The File to write the VCF to
      locusList - The Locus List to download the VCF for
      download - The StatePanel to use for displaying the operation progress
